channel.title: Divinity-X
channel.description:
[b][u]Navigation Links[/u][/b] - [url=http://Divinity-X.enjin.com]Website[/url]
From there you can get webclient and DL Client Links.
[u][b]Features[/b]:[/u] - Nex - Tormented Demons - Corporeal Beast - Daggaonth Kings - King Black Dragon (Wild) - Donator Zone with special benefits (updating more) - 100% All special Attacks Working - Vote with Voting Rewards (Automatic voting system with rewards coming soon) - 24.7 VPS(Virtual Private Server) Hosted - All Spirit Shields working - Added Steadfast, Glaveins, and Rage fire boots. - All Player Vs. Player Armors added and functioning.
[b][u]Why Choose us?[/u][/b] This server is extremely new and Owners are updating alot but need suggestions on what to add. We use our forums to listen to player suggestions and if voted on, will add your suggestions in-game. Come and Play an awesome server where the owners actually listen to what you have to say. You are rewarded with a dedicated owner and expect 100% uptime. We currently need a larger playerbase in order for the server to become whole. Come and Join now and you won't regret it!
[b][u]Time for some pictures![/u] [/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/15wcaag.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2hg8w06.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29ehxr9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9rpnxy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nyydjd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/3aozp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/b5pr39.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/9rr2pw.png[/img]
That's it for now guys, please feel free to leave back some positive criticism. I really appreciate it if you think what should be added to the server.
Thanks hope to see you guys come soon :)

item.title: Divinity-X
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Put some creativity into it mate, change up the home, fix the character models, stuff like that. Your first server should be a learning experience, don’t neglect any part of it, no matter how hard it is to learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Divinity-X
item.dc:creator: @Synchroze Synchroze
item.description:
@Synchroze wrote:

Another example of why players should come to offer their suggestions. Thanks for your commnent though.

Read full topic

item.title: Divinity-X
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

From the media you’ve posted, it seems the only thing you’ve changed is your shops and added a teleport.

Read full topic

item.title: Divinity-X
item.dc:creator: @Synchroze Synchroze
item.description:
@Synchroze wrote:

Navigation Links

  • Website

From there you can get webclient and DL Client Links.

Features:

  • Nex
  • Tormented Demons
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Daggaonth Kings
  • King Black Dragon (Wild)
  • Donator Zone with special benefits (updating more)
  • 100% All special Attacks Working
  • Vote with Voting Rewards (Automatic voting system with rewards coming soon)
  • 24.7 VPS(Virtual Private Server) Hosted
  • All Spirit Shields working
  • Added Steadfast, Glaveins, and Rage fire boots.
  • All Player Vs. Player Armors added and functioning.

Why Choose us?
This server is extremely new and Owners are updating alot but need suggestions on what to add. We use our forums to listen to player suggestions and if voted on, will add your suggestions in-game. Come and Play an awesome server where the owners actually listen to what you have to say. You are rewarded with a dedicated owner and expect 100% uptime. We currently need a larger playerbase in order for the server to become whole. Come and Join now and you won’t regret it!

Time for some pictures!
